1   package org.kohsuke.args4j.util;
2   
3   import java.util.ArrayList;
4   import java.util.Arrays;
5   import java.util.List;
6   
7   import org.junit.Test;
8   import org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineOptionsProvider;
9   import org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineParser;
10  import org.kohsuke.args4j.Option;
11  import org.kohsuke.args4j.ProxyOptionHandler;
12  
13  /**
14   * Test the {@link ArgsUtil} static functions
15   * 
16   * @author Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
17   */
18  public class TestArgsUtil {
19  	static enum Opt {
20  		FIRST, SECOND;
21  	}
22  
23  	interface ProxyOptionDetails {
24  	}
25  
26  	static enum ProxyOption implements CmdLineOptionsProvider {
27  		FIRST {
28  
29  			@Override
30  			public Object getOptions() {
31  				return new ProxyOptionDetails() {
32  					@Option(
33  							name = "--first-proxy-option",
34  							aliases = "-fpo",
35  							required = false,
36  							usage = "a string",
37  							multiValued = true)
38  					String firstOption = "first";
39  				};
40  			}
41  		},
42  		SECOND {
43  			@Override
44  			public Object getOptions() {
45  				return new ProxyOptionDetails() {
46  					@Option(
47  							name = "--second-proxy-option",
48  							aliases = "-spo",
49  							required = false,
50  							usage = "a string",
51  							multiValued = true)
52  					String secondOption = "second";
53  				};
54  			}
55  		};
56  	}
57  
58  	static class Arguments {
59  		@Option(name = "--a-list", aliases = "-l", required = false, usage = "simple list", multiValued = true)
60  		List<String> list = new ArrayList<String>();
61  
62  		@Option(name = "--a-bool", aliases = "-b", required = false, usage = "a boolean", multiValued = false)
63  		boolean bool;
64  
65  		@Option(name = "--s-string", aliases = "-s", required = false, usage = "simple string", metaVar = "STRING")
66  		int string;
67  
68  		@Option(name = "--a-enum", aliases = "-e", required = false, usage = "Enum entry")
69  		Opt statusType = Opt.FIRST;
70  
71  		@Option(
72  				name = "--proxy-option",
73  				aliases = "-p",
74  				required = false,
75  				usage = "Something with proxy options!",
76  				handler = ProxyOptionHandler.class)
77  		ProxyOption outputModeOption = ProxyOption.FIRST;
78  		ProxyOptionDetails outputModeOptionOp = (ProxyOptionDetails) ProxyOption.FIRST
79  				.getOptions();
80  	}
81  
82  	/**
83  	 * The test
84  	 * 
85  	 * @throws Exception
86  	 */
87  	@Test
88  	public void testArgs() throws Exception {
89  		final Arguments args = new Arguments();
90  		args.list.add("wang");
91  		args.list.add("bang");
92  		args.statusType = Opt.SECOND;
93  		String[] asArgArray = ArgsUtil.extractArguments(args);
94  		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(asArgArray));
95  
96  		CmdLineParser parser = new CmdLineParser(args);
97  		parser.parseArgument(asArgArray);
98  
99  		args.outputModeOption = ProxyOption.SECOND;
100 		args.outputModeOptionOp = (ProxyOptionDetails) args.outputModeOption.getOptions();
101 		args.string = 2;
102 		args.bool = true;
103 		asArgArray = ArgsUtil.extractArguments(args);
104 
105 		parser = new CmdLineParser(args);
106 		parser.parseArgument(asArgArray);
107 		System.out.println(Arrays.toString(asArgArray));
108 	}
109 
110 }
